snippet: Charles J. Hynes, nearly a fixture in the Brooklyn district attorney’s office, is being challenged amid a stream of bad publicity.
abstract: Charles J Hynes, nearly a fixture in the Brooklyn district attorney office, faces steady stream of negative publicity around series of wrongful convictions that occurred under his watch, yet he still appears confident as he campaigns for a seventh term; he is racking up endorsements, trumpeting his accomplishments and offering well-honed rejoinders to criticisms.
lead_paragraph: Charles J. Hynes, nearly a fixture in the Brooklyn district attorney’s office, is being challenged amid a stream of bad publicity.

headline.seo: For Hynes, D.A. Since 1990, Publicity and Rivals
headline.main: For Hynes, District Attorney Since 1990, Publicity and Campaign Rivals
headline.print_headline: For Hynes, in Office Since 1990, Publicity and Campaign Rivals
